definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: After a five-year hiatus, the Billboard Music Awards officially returned in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 经过5年的停办，美国公告牌音乐奖重回荧屏。

sentences.english: College life may never be this tumultuous, but then again, this is TV.
sentences.chinese: 大学生活本不应该动动荡荡，仅仅体现在荧屏上。

sentences.english: After the quote was removed from the screen, Russert turned to me.
sentences.chinese: 在摘录被从荧屏上移走后，拉塞特转向我。

sentences.english: Alternatively, the touch screen can be used to select a square.
sentences.chinese: 二者择一地，触觉荧屏能用来选择一个正方形。

sentences.english: Fans have waited a long time to see Harry Potter's kiss on the big screen.
sentences.chinese: “哈迷”们对哈利波特的荧屏初吻期待已久。

sentences.english: Rescaling of video to utilize full-screen area.
sentences.chinese: 录象机的再计数利用全荧屏区域。

sentences.english: His Scottish detective character, named Rebus, has been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 他的苏格兰私人侦探“雷布斯”已经被搬上荧屏。

sentences.english: Works based on the Four Masters' Works appear constantly on television.
sentences.chinese: 由四大名著改编的电视作品经常被搬上荧屏。

sentences.english: After sleep eyes still leave screen flash, blurred vision.
sentences.chinese: 分开荧屏后仍觉长远闪光，目力恍惚。

sentences.english: A square inch place includes the infinite universe, small screen deduction in society all phenomena on earth.
sentences.chinese: 方寸之地包罗大千世界，小小荧屏演绎世间万象。

sentences.english: And most of this on-screen violence is committed by men, as well.
sentences.chinese: 并且绝大部分荧屏上的暴力也是由男性实施的。

sentences.english: However, the screens have a limited lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这种荧屏的使用寿命有限。

definition: to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
